title: 20 Small Crossbody Bags That You Won’t Overfill
excerpt: Ahead, I compiled 20 of the best small crossbody bags to keep you stylish while limiting your load. ﻿Whether you want a vegan leather option or a luxury designer style, look no further.
text: Best Trending Coach Empire Carryall Bag This bag has spent countless minutes both on my TikTok page and in my shopping cart. Coach’s carry-all went viral after its debut in the brand’s fall 2024 runway, and this smaller rendition is even easier to use on the daily. Dimensions: Length: 12 inches; width: 5.25 inches; height: 7.25 inches Colors: Black Material: Glovetanned leatherCustomer review: “My new favorite handbag. This is the perfect size for my everyday items, and it instantly elevates any outfit. The leather is beautiful and slouches just right. Highly recommend.”Best Sling Madewell Essentials Crescent Sling BagThe sling bag has made a big comeback, and now is the perfect time to treat yourself to this practical style. To sweeten the deal, Madewell’s leather is sustainably certified. html:
Best Trending

Coach Empire Carryall Bag

This bag has spent countless minutes both on my TikTok page and in my shopping cart. Coach’s carry-all went viral after its debut in the brand’s fall 2024 runway, and this smaller rendition is even easier to use on the daily.

Dimensions: Length: 12 inches; width: 5.25 inches; height: 7.25 inches

Colors: Black

Material: Glovetanned leather

Customer review: “My new favorite handbag. This is the perfect size for my everyday items, and it instantly elevates any outfit. The leather is beautiful and slouches just right. Highly recommend.”

Best Sling

Madewell Essentials Crescent Sling Bag

The sling bag has made a big comeback, and now is the perfect time to treat yourself to this practical style. To sweeten the deal, Madewell’s leather is sustainably certified.

Dimensions: Length: 13.5 inches; width: 2.75 inches; height: 6.75 inches

Colors: Black, Chocolate, Forest, Indigo, Olive

Material: Leather

Customer review: “I love how simple and classy this is. It’s so easy to wear and fits a surprisingly amount of things.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Most Versatile

Freja NYC Mini Shoulder Bag Pecan

Wear this bag as a shoulder or a crossbody, and stay organized on the go with two thoughtfully designed compartments.

Dimensions: Length: 10 inches; width: 3 inches; height: 5.2 inches

Colors: Pecan, Oat, Latte, Taupe, Black

Material: Vegan leather

Customer review: “I’m obsessed with this bag! It goes well with anything I put on, even loungewear. Let this review be the sign for you to purchase this bag!”

Best Suede

Little Liffner Penne Mini Bucket

Scandinavian brand Little Liffner has mastered the art of minimalist designs that still draw the eye. And no matter the form, suede is the material that keeps on giving look after look this season.

Dimensions: Length: 5.9 inches; width: 4.3 inches; height: 9 inches

Colors: Dark Brown, Black

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Pop of Color

Givenchy Nano Voyou Leather Crossbody Bag

A recent favorite from Givenchy, the Voyou features belted hardware and a tumbled leather exterior. I love the street style aesthetic and the casual slouchiness.

Dimensions: Length: 6.5 inches; width: 2 inches; height: 6 inches

Colors: Black, Ivory, Red

Material: Calfskin

Best Investment

Gucci Horsebit 1955 Mini Shoulder Bag

Gucci’s timeless horsebit emblem takes center stage in this functional crossbody bag.

Dimensions: Length: 7.9 inches; width: 2.4 inches; height: 5.1 inches

Colors: Brown, White, Canvas

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Designer

Bottega Veneta Mini Loop Camera Bag

With its signature woven leather and striking hue, Bottega Veneta’s camera bag has become a staple for the gal (or guy!) in the know. Carry it from day to night by dressing it up or down.

Dimensions: Length: 5.1 inches; width: 2.4 inches; height: 3.3 inches

Colors: Black, White, Parakeet

Material: Calfskin leather

Best Pattern

Burberry Snip Check Jacquard Crossbody Bag

The Burberry check we know and love takes a new form in this neat silhouette that transitions from crossbody to shoulder bag with ease. Posh, right?

Dimensions: Length: 9 inches; width: 3 inches; height: 6 inches

Material: Textile, leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Cinched Bag

Jimmy Choo Cinch Bag

Jimmy Choo does more than just shoes, and this bag is a perfect example of the house’s multifaceted craftsmanship. The relaxed silhouette offers an elevated take on the average bucket bag.

Dimensions: Length: 8.6 inches; width: 4.3 inches; height: 4.7 inches

Colors: White, Black, Red

Material: Calf leather

Best Reimagined Style

3.1 Phillip Lim ID Flap Leather Shoulder Bag

This smooth revamp of Phillip Lim’s ID series comes in three colors that transcend seasonality.

Dimensions: Length: 8 inches; width: 4 inches; height: 6.25 inches

Colors: Wine, Black, Blue

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Shearling

DeMellier The Tokyo Saddle Bag

Demellier’s shearling Tokyo bag is the perfect piece to add warmth to your winter ensembles. It’s also available in all leather, too.

Dimensions: Length: 9.4 inches; width: 3.1 inches; height: 6.7 inches

Colors: 7 options

Material: Leather, shearling

Best Convertible Clutch

Ferragamo Hug Crossbody Bag

Ferragamo’s handbags have evolved a lot in recent years, landing the Hug on the ELLE’s list of favorites. Its subtle design is sophisticated yet contemporary.

Dimensions: Length: 9.4 inches; width: 2.1 inches; height: 5.5 inches

Colors: Camel, Sky Blue, Navy, Black

Material: Calfskin leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Mini Tote

MZ Wallace Micro Metro Tote Deluxe

Durable enough for everyday wear, MZ Wallace’s nylon bags are ideal for toting around town and traveling. The wide adjustable strap provides added comfort, too.

Dimensions: Length: 6.3 inches; width: 6.3 inches; height: 6.69 inches

Colors: 13 options

Material: Nylon

Customer review: “This bag is small in size, but big in style. It’s large enough to hold necessities yet still lightweight.”

Best Top Handle

Mulberry Lana Crossbody Bag

Mulberry knows that a top handle bag never goes out of style. Add a crossbody strap for versatility, and you’ve struck the perfect balance. Anyone else in awe of the Daliesque hardware?

Dimensions: Length: 7.25 inches; width: 3.25 inches; height: 5 inches

Colors: 9 options

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Mixed Material

Loewe Small Puzzle Bag

Choosing a bag to complete your outfit is like finding the final puzzle piece. This mixed material option offers an eclectic array of textures and is ideal for a fall/winter palette.

Dimensions: Length: 9.4 inches; width: 4.1 inches; height: 6.5 inches

Material: Leather, cotton, linen

Best Classic

Loro Piana Mini Ghiera Bag

A master of quiet luxury, Loro Piana lets its designs do the talking. The blend of structure and suppleness is unbeatable.

Dimensions: Length: 7 inches; width: 2.7 inches; height: 5.1 inches

Colors: Green, Cream

Material: Calfskin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Most Color Options

Polene Numero Dix Bag

Polène’s crescent design comes with two straps for shoulder or crossbody wear. Cool and sleek, this black bag adds an edge to everyday attire.

Dimensions: Length: 9.4 inches; width: 2.9 inches; 7.87 height: inches

Colors: 18 options

Material: Calf leather

Subtle and Chic

Tom Ford Mini Tara Leather Crossbody Bag

The sculptural hardware is the focal point of this Tom Ford crossbody. I appreciate the change of pace from the often loud markings of designer labels.

Dimensions: Length: 7.75 inches; width: 2.75 inches; height: 7.25 inches

Colors: Taupe, Blue, Chalk, Black

Material: Grain Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Metallic

Alexis Bittar The Hunter Convertible Crossbody Bag

Pulling inspiration from Alexis Bittar’s signature bangles, this convertible crossbody is a beautiful display of minimal modernity. The striking metallic finish and dimension-delivering cutouts are sure to make you stand out from the crowd.

Dimensions: Length: 8 inches; width: 2.5 inches; height: 7 inches

Colors: Silver, Brown, Black

Materials: Leather

Most Compact

Marc Jacobs The Leather Mini Bag

Marc Jacobs’ mini bag pulls inspiration from the designer’s iconic tote bag and acts as the ultimate wallet replacement. With eight interior card slots, you have everything you need and room to spare.

Dimensions: Length: 8 inches; width: 1 inch; height: 5 inches

Material: Leather

Customer review: “Amazing quality and very cute.”
